name: Core (itch) (SHALDMI)
description:
Core is a puzzle game in which you have to survive. You are on a spaceship whose engine suddenly breaks down. The entire crew is in cryogenic sleep and you have to cope with the task alone. Can you find a way out in one minute?

The game was created as part of One Minute Jam, and is currently in development. A lot of mechanics will be introduced at later stages of development.
